mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES ( BOOK_ID, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND BOOK_ID = #{bookId}
mapper.select: SELECT B.ID, TITLE, A.NAME AS authorName, P.NAME AS publisherName, PUBLISHED_DATE AS publishedDate, B.AUTHOR_ID AS authorId, B.PUBLISHER_ID AS publisherId, B.PRICE, B.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, B.IMG_PATH AS imgPath FROM LIKES L JOIN BOOK B ON L.BOOK_ID = B.ID JOIN AUTHOR A ON B.AUTHOR_ID = A.ID JOIN PUBLISHER P ON B.PUBLISHER_ID = P.ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MENU ( MENU_ID, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES (#{menuId}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_MENU WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.PATH FROM USER_MENU UM JOIN MENU M ON UM.MENU_ID = M.ID WHERE UM.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
